name: CHANEL
description:
Details:

From the legendary N°5 to effortlessly wearable foundations, CHANEL fragrances and beauty are sophisticated and timeless.

name: CHANEL Bleu De CHANEL After-Shave Lotion, 100ml
description:
The aromatic-woody notes of BLEU DE CHANEL in an after-shave lotion that soothes razor burn. Energising and bracing, it leaves the skin delicately scented.

The aromatic-woody notes of BLEU DE CHANEL find expression in a full line of shaving and body products.

None

name: CHANEL Chance Eau Fraîche Eau de Parfum Spray
description:
A sparkling, floral and woody fragrance. An intense surge of energy and vitality. An olfactory encounter with chance that is both fresh and intense.

An elegant composition with intense freshness, resting on a deep, rich woody base. The fragrance opens with the zesty freshness of a citron accord, intensely invigorating and exhilarating, then unveils a round and luminous floral heart, rich in jasmine. The vibrant presence of teak wood, dense and ambery, leaves a lingering trail.

Using a sweeping movement, spray Chance Eau Fraîche Eau de Parfum generously on the skin or inside clothing.

None

name: CHANEL Ultra Le Teint Velvet Blurring Smooth-Effect Foundation Velvet Matte Finish
description:
ULTRA LE TEINT VELVET is a longwear foundation that naturally smooths skin and creates an even-looking complexion. It features a blurring effect to conceal the appearance of imperfections and has a matte velvet finish. Ultra-light with an ultra-natural matte finish, it blends instantly and seamlessly with the skin, for a perfect complexion all day long. This soft emulsion is suitable for normal and combination skin types, providing a flawless result.

How to use:

Apply ULTRA LE TEINT VELVET after your daily skincare, without a sponge or brush. Shake well for a perfectly even texture. When you can no longer hear the bead inside, the ultra-light formula is ready. Use your fingertips to apply, blending from the centre of the face outwards. Adjust the coverage by dabbing small amounts onto targeted areas.

None

name: CHANEL N°5 The Hair Mist
description:
Housed in a transparent, frosted version of the iconic bottle, the N°5 hair mist, enriched with an active ingredient derived from rose and jasmine, diffuses the subtle notes of the fragrance and gives hair shine and a silky texture.

None

name: CHANEL La Base Camélia Fortifying, Protecting And Smoothing Base Coat, 13ml
description:
La Base Camélia is a true treatment for the nails thanks to its active ingredient: camellia oil. It strengthens, smooths, visibly nourishes and corrects imperfections on the nails from the first application. Its unique formula coats the nails in a protective layer, leaving a shiny, slightly rosy finish.

Immediately after application, nails feel harder, are smoother in texture and look shinier. Discolouration and other imperfections appear diminished.

After one month of use, the nails look more beautiful than ever: they are stronger (+28%*), more visibly nourished (+13%*) and naturally shinier (+24%*).

More than just a base coat, this treatment enhances the appearance of the nails day after day.

*Clinical evaluation of 21 women after 1 month of use.

None

name: CHANEL Inimitable Waterproof Volume - Length - Curl - Separation, 10 Noir
description:
A mascara that offers an instant, natural and long-lasting 3D makeup result. Application that ensures volume, length, curl and separation of lashes. Water-resistant.

The perfect union of brush and formula provides a multi-dimensional effect:

  • The soft and flexible elastomer brush lines up ultra-thin bristles precisely adjusted for optimal cling and application.
  • The waterproof formula resists water, humidity and sebum. It offers a 3D makeup result with no clumps in sight.
  • Mineral waxes and a blend of polymers to offer volume, length, curl and lasting hold to lashes.
  • Carnauba wax and beeswax for a shiny makeup result and a volumising effect.
  • Provitamin B5 for a nourishing effect.

    • Ophthalmologist tested, suitable for contact lens wearers

    None

name: CHANEL Les Beiges Healthy Glow Lip Balm
description:
A balm to hydrate and revive the natural lip colour. Luscious and comfortable, it enhances lips with a sheer finish for an instantly radiant effect.

Available in several subtle shades which adapt to all skin tones. Enriched with Vitamin E and moringa butter, the formula nourishes and protects the lips throughout the day.

From the very first stroke, lips are smoothed, softened, and delicately tinted.

  • Hydrating and nourishing moringa butter reinforces the natural barrier of the lips and ensures optimal comfort and hydration
  • An antioxidant Vitamin E derivative protects lips against environmental aggressors
None

name: CHANEL Allure Homme Sport All-Over Spray, 100ml
description:
The fresh, woody scent and aquatic notes of ALLURE HOMME SPORT, in a fresh and hydrating fragrance body spray, a new way to wear fragrance. Infused with Japanese green citrus extract, an active ingredient developed by CHANEL, this All-Over Spray helps keep skin feeling comfortable and hydrated. A light mist leaves it subtly scented. The product's portable format, designed to be taken everywhere with you, allows you to prolong your scent trail at any time of day.

ALLURE HOMME SPORT All-Over Spray lends itself to generous and spontaneous misting, on the body and inside clothing. Its portable format that you can take anywhere with you allows for easy re-application throughout the day.

Wear alone or layer with ALLURE HOMME SPORT Eau de Toilette.

None

name: CHANEL La Mousse Clarifiante Refining Lotion-To-Foam Pump Bottle, 150ml
description:
LA MOUSSE CLARIFIANTE is a gentle exfoliant that reduces the look of imperfections by refining the skin's texture and diminishing the appearance of pores.

A new step in the skin prep ritual, it incorporates all of the House's expertise in formulation, resulting in a dense, gentle, sensuous foam.

Enriched with camellia water, this lightweight lotion transforms into a fresh foam in just one pump. Composed of 95% naturally derived ingredients*, its delicate, airy formula protects the skin's natural barrier and does not require rinsing.

*Proportion of natural ingredients and derivatives calculated according to ISO 16128.

None

name: CHANEL N°19 Eau de Parfum Spray
description:
A daring, distinctive fragrance. The vibrant, green notes of Galbanum blend with the powdery notes of Iris to strike a perfect balance. The last fragrance launched and worn by Gabrielle Chanel. An uncompromising composition, in the image of Mademoiselle.

A daring floral-woody-green fragrance that plays with contrasts.

A perfect balance between the vibrant, green notes of Galbanum and the soft, powdery notes of Iris Pallida. A rich, smooth variation with a greater floral dimension, heightened by Ylang-Ylang, Lily-of-the-Valley and Rose.

None

name: CHANEL Allure Eau de Parfum Spray
description:
The very definition of elegance according to Mademoiselle Chanel. Charismatic and natural. A floral-fresh-Amber fragrance in six facets that finds an expression unique to each woman. Because every woman has her own special allure.

A floral-fresh-Amber fragrance that is refined and elegant.

It reveals its six facets in a way that is unique to each woman. A composition that combines the sparkling notes of Mandarin, the softness of Rose and the sensuality of Vanilla. The floral, fruity and Amber notes have been magnified.

The eau de parfum comes in a spray format for an effortless application on skin or clothing.

A complete perfuming ritual for the bath and body is also available to enhance the fragrance trail.

None

name: CHANEL Coco Mademoiselle Eau de Parfum Twist and Spray
description:
The essence of a bold, free woman. An Amber fragrance with a strong personality, yet surprisingly fresh. The eau de parfum comes in a "Twist And Spray" format you can slip into your purse. A simple twist envelops you in the modern notes of this Amber-fresh fragrance.

An Amber fragrance with a strong personality, yet surprisingly fresh.

Sparks of fresh and vibrant orange immediately awaken the senses. A clear and sensual heart reveals the transparent accords of Jasmine and Rose. The trail unfurls the pure accents of Patchouli and Vetiver that emphasise the slender structure of the composition.

The eau de parfum comes in a purse spray format to revive the notes of the fragrance throughout the day.

A complete perfuming ritual for the bath and body is also available to enhance the fragrance trail.

None

name: CHANEL Les Beiges Healthy Glow Natural Eyeshadow Palette
description:
A palette of 5 natural, easy-to-wear colours to match every mood and create endless looks, from the most discreet to the most intense.

Its silky texture glides softly over the eyelids for an even, luminous and long-wearing result.

Multipurpose, LES BEIGES HEALTHY GLOW NATURAL EYESHADOW PALETTE can be used as a base, highlighter or eyeshadow.

Its iconic LES BEIGES case includes a large mirror and two applicators: a foam tip to apply and a brush with extremely soft synthetic bristles to blend.

None

name: CHANEL Rouge Allure Velvet Nuit Blanche Limited Edition - Luminous Matte Lip Colour
description:
Luminous matte lipstick: this ultra-comfortable lip colour wears like a second skin and enhances lips with pure, concentrated pigments, for an intense and long-lasting luminous finish.

A jojoba oil derivative and shea butter make for a soft formula that instantly leaves lips feeling moisturised and supple.

A lipstick housed in a limited-edition white case with black trim, available in eight new shades.

None

name: CHANEL UV Essentiel Complete Protection UV - Pollution - Antioxidant SPF 50 Tube, 30ml
description:
UV ESSENTIEL offers the benefits of a new and improved skincare formula, for complete protection. It protects the skin from UV rays, pollution and oxidation, all at once.

Even when it is cloudy, the sun's rays are constantly damaging the skin throughout the year, accelerating skin ageing. SPF 50 and a 'skin strengthening' complex, made with blue ginger extract from the CHANEL open-sky laboratory in Madagascar, and Tahitian gardenia extract, protect against UV rays and boost the skin's natural defences. Filters act as a shield against UV rays and prevent premature photo-ageing. Its unique texture, as light as a gel and as comfortable as a cream, leaves behind a delicate veil on the skin. Protected, fortified and hydrated, skin is left looking radiant.

None

name: CHANEL Pinceau Blush N°110 Blush Brush
description:
LES PINCEAUX DE CHANEL brushes give everyone access to makeup artist techniques. Their simple yet functional design makes this a collection of desirable on-the-go accessories. Featuring a selection of synthetic bristles as soft as they are resilient, protected by a black lacquered case, they elegantly stand the test of time.

The BLUSH BRUSH is designed for blush application. Its rounded shape is ideal for redefining cheekbones and accentuating contours in one spontaneous sweep.

CARE INSTRUCTIONS:

Designed to stand the test of time, LES PINCEAUX DE CHANEL brushes with synthetic bristles should be washed regularly with warm water and shampoo or mild soap. Leave flat to air dry away from sources of heat.

None

name: CHANEL Bleu De CHANEL Parfum Spray
description:
An ode to masculine freedom expressed in an aromatic-woody fragrance with a captivating trail. A timeless scent housed in a bottle of deep and mysterious blue. BLEU DE CHANEL Parfum is an accomplished composition with a pure, deep character. An intensely masculine signature that exudes self-confidence.

BLEU DE CHANEL Parfum is an aromatic, intensely woody fragrance. It opens with powerful freshness, then lingers with a precious accord of New Caledonian sandalwood that unfurls its generous, powerful notes in a dense and sophisticated trail.

BLEU DE CHANEL is the fragrance of a man who refuses to be bound by rules. It reveals a character that asserts itself with independence and determination. The spirit of a man who chooses his destiny.

None

name: CHANEL Chance Eau de Toilette Twist and Spray
description:
A floral fragrance in a round bottle. Unpredictable, in perpetual movement, CHANCE sweeps you into its whirlwind of happiness and fantasy. The "Twist And Spray" slips easily into your purse and is the ideal way to revive your fragrance throughout the day...An olfactory encounter with chance.

A floral fragrance that intertwines Pink Pepper, Jasmine and Amber Patchouli. An unpredictable, elusive, ever-changing fragrance—in turn floral, spicy, sensual and rich.

The eau de toilette comes in a "TWIST AND SPRAY" purse spray to revive the notes of the fragrance throughout the day.

A complete perfuming ritual for the bath and body is also used to enhance the fragrance trail.

None

name: CHANEL Joues Contraste Intense Cream-To-Powder Blush
description:
The JOUES CONTRASTE INTENSE blush is both creamy and versatile, featuring a new, ultra-fine velvety texture. When applied directly to the cheeks using your fingers, the ultra-sensorial formula blends seamlessly with the skin for buildable colour intensity and bespoke makeup looks, ranging from subtle to powerful.

Available in five vibrant shades, designed to flatter every skin tone, JOUES CONTRASTE INTENSE ensures 12 hours of wear*.

*Clinical evaluation, panel of 20 voluntary participants.

How to use:

Apply JOUES CONTRASTE INTENSE onto the centre of the cheeks using your fingers. Extend the product out towards the tops of the cheekbones, blending lightly.

For a lighter, or even sheer, look, apply JOUES CONTRASTE INTENSE using the PRECISION POWDER BRUSH N°107. Extend the product out with the PRECISION POWDER BRUSH N°107 and blend along the tops of the cheekbones to add depth.

None

name: CHANEL Allure Homme All-Over Spray, 100ml
description:
The fresh, spicy, woody scent of ALLURE HOMME, in a fresh and hydrating fragrance body spray, a new way to wear fragrance. Infused with Japanese green citrus extract, an active ingredient developed by CHANEL, this All-Over Spray helps keep skin feeling comfortable and hydrated. A light mist leaves it subtly scented.

The product's portable format, designed to be taken everywhere with you, allows you to prolong your scent trail at any time of day.

ALLURE HOMME All-Over Spray lends itself to generous and spontaneous misting, on the body and inside clothing. Its portable format that you can take anywhere allows for easy re-application throughout the day.

Wear alone or layer with ALLURE HOMME Eau de Toilette.

None

name: CHANEL Le Recourbe Cils De CHANEL Eyelash Curler
description:
Eyelash curler with two protective silicone pad replacements.
A beauty essential that adapts to all eye shapes to optimise and set the natural curl of the lashes. An easy-to-use accessory that is gentle and fits perfectly on all types of lashes, without damaging them.

None

name: CHANEL Le Lift Smoothing And Firming Cream
description:
For the first time, CHANEL has created a new smoothing and firming cream, highly concentrated in naturally occurring ingredients. LE LIFT Crème is formulated using 94% naturally occurring ingredients, including a new star ingredient: botanical alfalfa concentrate, which has been shown to be as efficient as retinol* and gentle on the skin.

The new LE LIFT cream is available in three textures: Crème Fine, Crème and Crème Riche. Three textures in perfect affinity with the skin that deliver a truly sensory experience.

*Comparisons of the stimulation of keratinocyte differentiation and proliferation, as well as Type I collagen synthesis – In vitro tests. Comparison of the increase of epidermal thickness – Tests on reconstructed skin. Comparisons of anti-wrinkle and smoothing effects – Instrumental evaluation of 21 women.

None

name: CHANEL Bleu De CHANEL Eau de Toilette Spray - 50ml
description: CHANEL Bleu De CHANEL Eau de Toilette Spray - 50ml

name: CHANEL Bleu De CHANEL Eau de Toilette Spray - 150ml
description: CHANEL Bleu De CHANEL Eau de Toilette Spray - 150ml

name: CHANEL Bleu De CHANEL Eau de Toilette Spray - 100ml
description: CHANEL Bleu De CHANEL Eau de Toilette Spray - 100ml

name: CHANEL Allure Sensuelle Eau de Parfum Spray - 100ml
description: CHANEL Allure Sensuelle Eau de Parfum Spray - 100ml

name: CHANEL Allure Sensuelle Eau de Parfum Spray - 50ml
description: CHANEL Allure Sensuelle Eau de Parfum Spray - 50ml

name: CHANEL Le Gel Coat Lacquered Finish Enhanced Protection
description:
Highlight the lacquered finish and shine of LE VERNIS with a single swipe. Its new formula, enriched with naturally derived camellia oil, accentuates the shine and the smooth curve of the nails while protecting the polish for a longer-lasting hold.

None

name: CHANEL N°5 Eau de Toilette Spray - 100ml
description: CHANEL N°5 Eau de Toilette Spray - 100ml

name: CHANEL N°5 Eau de Toilette Spray - 50ml
description: CHANEL N°5 Eau de Toilette Spray - 50ml

name: CHANEL Ombre Première Laque New Longwear Liquid Eyeshadow - 28 Desert Wind
description: CHANEL Ombre Première Laque New Longwear Liquid Eyeshadow - 28 Desert Wind

name: CHANEL Ombre Première Laque New Longwear Liquid Eyeshadow - 26 Quartz Rose
description: CHANEL Ombre Première Laque New Longwear Liquid Eyeshadow - 26 Quartz Rose

name: CHANEL Ombre Première Laque New Longwear Liquid Eyeshadow - 22 Rayon
description: CHANEL Ombre Première Laque New Longwear Liquid Eyeshadow - 22 Rayon

name: CHANEL Ombre Première Laque New Longwear Liquid Eyeshadow - 32 Vastness
description: CHANEL Ombre Première Laque New Longwear Liquid Eyeshadow - 32 Vastness

name: CHANEL Sublimage L'essence De Teint Ultimate Radiance-Generating Serum Foundation, BD01
description:
With a unique texture that fuses with the skin, the first serum foundation by CHANEL concentrates the benefits of Vanilla Planifolia and the power of a radiance generator.

Unprecedented for a foundation, its formula combines light-reflecting particles and pigments to deliver immediate radiance that lasts all day long. Its serum-like texture is luscious yet lightweight and fresh. It melts into the skin to make it look smoother and reveal its radiance with a sheer finish. The signature brush ensures subtle, personalised application for buildable coverage.

The complexion is sublime, with a luminous finish. Skin is perfectly hydrated, comfortable and protected from external aggressors.

  • Apply a drop of foundation onto the top of your hand and take a pearl-sized amount of SUBLIMAGE L’ESSENCE DE TEINT with the tip of the signature brush
  • Dab the serum foundation onto each cheek, the forehead, the chin and the neck. Then, smooth over face, from the centre outwards
  • Even out with circular movements
  • For buildable coverage, work more foundation onto the face
None

name: CHANEL Les Beiges Healthy Glow Foundation Hydration And Longwear
description:
A natural-looking foundation that infuses the skin with the radiance of a day spent in the great outdoors.

Its fine, silky texture glides over skin and forms a layer that is both invisible to the eye and imperceptible to touch, like a second skin.

Its combination of light-reflecting powders and pigments makes the skin's texture appear smoother. Imperfections are diminished. The complexion is unified, without a trace.

With its adjustable coverage and longwear formula, skin glows for 12 hours.*

The formula also protects skin from external aggressors such as pollution.

Enriched with hydrating ingredients, it delivers a sensation of immediate comfort and hydrates skin day after day.

Available in 35 shades, the LES BEIGES HEALTHY GLOW FOUNDATION HYDRATION AND LONGWEAR allows each woman to find a shade that is a perfect match.

*Clinical evaluation on 21 women.

None

name: CHANEL Sublimage L'essence De Teint Ultimate Radiance-Generating Serum Foundation, B00
description:
With a unique texture that fuses with the skin, the first serum foundation by CHANEL concentrates the benefits of Vanilla Planifolia and the power of a radiance generator. Unprecedented for a foundation, its formula combines light-reflecting particles and pigments to deliver immediate radiance that lasts all day long. Its serum-like texture is luscious yet lightweight and fresh. It melts into the skin to make it look smoother and reveal its radiance with a sheer finish. The signature brush ensures subtle, personalised application for buildable coverage.

The complexion is sublime, with a luminous finish. Skin is perfectly hydrated, comfortable and protected from external aggressors.

How to use:

  • Apply a drop of foundation onto the top of your hand and take a pearl-sized amount of SUBLIMAGE L’ESSENCE DE TEINT with the tip of the signature brush
  • Dab the serum foundation onto each cheek, the forehead, the chin and the neck. Then, smooth over the face, from the centre outwards
  • Even out with circular movements
  • For buildable coverage, work more foundation onto the face
None

name: CHANEL Rouge Allure Liquid Velvet Ultrawear Intense Matte Liquid Lip Colour
description:
ROUGE ALLURE LIQUID VELVET, the new ultrawear, ultra-comfortable liquid lipstick by CHANEL with a smoothing and blurring effect and an intense matte finish.

A long-lasting matte liquid lipstick that offers up to 12 hours* of intense colour. A moisturising and protective formula that wears like a second skin and is easy to apply: lips feel supple and comfortable after one coat and stay smooth all day long.

Fifteen intensely pigmented shades: from a subtle nude to a bold purple and a deep red. A naturally derived dispersion oil reveals the highly concentrated pigments, for intense colour.

Thanks to an ultra-slim applicator, the lipstick can be applied precisely and evenly.

*Clinical test performed on a panel of 22 voluntary participants.

How to use:

For perfectly defined lips, use the flat side of the applicator to apply product to the centre of the lips. Then use the tip for the Cupid’s bow and corners of the lips.

For an even more precise look, line lips with LE CRAYON LÈVRES in a matching shade before applying ROUGE ALLURE LIQUID VELVET.

None

name: CHANEL Hydra Beauty Micro Crème Fortifying Replenishing Hydration
description:
At the forefront of microfluidic technologies, CHANEL Research has created the 1st cream with camellia micro-droplets. At the heart of micro-droplets, the camellia extract is preserved in its purest form. Upon application, the micro-droplets fuse with the skin and penetrate deep within. Intensely replenished and resilient, skin is beautifully radiant.

HYDRA BEAUTY Micro Crème creates a surprising sensory cascade: as fresh and light as water, but as comfortable as a cream.

All skin types.

HYDRA BEAUTY Micro Crème continuously infuses the skin with moisture. Its replenishing action helps to restore skin volume and vitality.

Skin is not only intensely hydrated and replenished, but also stronger and more resistant to environmental stress thanks to its reinforced antioxidant action.

  • Hydration: 24 HRS*
  • Replenishing Effect: 22%**
  • Fortifying Effect: 92%***

*Instrumental test on 19 women. **Clinical evaluation of 34 women, after 1 month of use. ***Reinforced antioxidant action: the skin is more resistant to oxidative environmental stress. Ex-vivo evaluation after 4 applications.

name: CHANEL Coco Eau de Parfum Spray
description:
COCO expresses the intensity of Gabrielle Chanel's personality and her love of all things baroque. A luxuriant Amber symphony that gradually reveals its contrasting notes.

A luxuriant composition with contrasting notes.

The fragrance opens with a citrus note of Sicilian Mandarin, and reveals a voluptuous heart of Jasmine Absolute, heightened with touches of Ylang-Ylang from the Comoros and Tunisian Orange Blossom. A captivating harmony that leaves behind a vibrant trail of Indonesian Patchouli, Tonka note and Benzoin.

The eau de parfum comes in a spray format for effortless application on skin or clothing.

A complete perfuming ritual for the bath and body is also available to enhance its trail of scent.

None

name: CHANEL Chance Eau Tendre Eau de Parfum Spray
description:
An even tenderer interpretation of CHANCE. A delicate presence, an intensely feminine and enveloping trail. A new chance for the taking.

A composition with a radiant heart intensified by jasmine absolute and rose essence. A dazzling floral-fruity fragrance, a full and tender interpretation with heightened femininity.

The Eau de Parfum comes in a spray for more generous use, with easy and fluent application on the skin or clothing.

None

name: CHANEL Bleu De CHANEL Eau De Parfum Spray - 150ml
description: CHANEL Bleu De CHANEL Eau De Parfum Spray - 150ml

name: CHANEL Bleu De CHANEL Eau De Parfum Spray - 50ml
description: CHANEL Bleu De CHANEL Eau De Parfum Spray - 50ml

name: CHANEL Bleu De CHANEL Eau De Parfum Spray - 100ml
description: CHANEL Bleu De CHANEL Eau De Parfum Spray - 100ml

name: CHANEL N°5 Eau De Parfum Refillable Purse Spray
description:
This holiday season, discover an all-new way to wear fragrance. The new limited-edition N°5 Eau de Parfum purse spray is adorned with an accessory that complements its golden trim. It features a jewellery chain bearing Gabrielle Chanel's favourite number, which allows it to be worn around the wrist. Add this piece to your collection and show it off as often as you wish.

Each purse spray is presented in a white, woven sleeve, featuring the CHANEL name embroidered in gold. Includes three refills.

How to use:

The new N°5 Eau de Parfum purse spray is both wearable and portable, so it can go wherever you do. Slide it into a bag or slip the jewellery chain around your wrist, then prolong your scent trail throughout the day with just one twist.

None

name: CHANEL Coco Mademoiselle Hair Perfume, 35ml
description:
COCO MADEMOISELLE HAIR PERFUME scents hair with the airiest, freshest and most delicate notes of the fragrance, revealing a subtle scent trail with your hair's every movement. A formula specifically designed for hair, enriched with an emollient that leaves it silky smooth without weighing it down or drying it out. Its travel-friendly frosted pink bottle fits easily into a handbag. An ideal way to revive the scent trail of the ambery-fresh fragrance throughout the day.

Mist the hair perfume onto a brush or onto hair, forming an arch above your head.
Wear alone for a fresh and airy trail, pair with the Eau de Parfum for a more intense trail, or alternate between the two throughout the day to revive the notes of the ambery-fresh fragrance.

None

name: CHANEL Allure Homme Sport Shower Gel, 200ml
description:
The fresh and enveloping notes of ALLURE HOMME SPORT in a shower gel. It works into a generous foam which gently cleanses and leaves the skin delicately scented. The bottle, with a sliding cap for easy use, features the same style elements as the fragrance.

None

name: CHANEL Paris-Paris Les Eaux de CHANEL - Hair And Body Gel, 200ml
description:
Inspired by casual Parisian elegance, this shower gel, with a fine and delicate lather, perfumes the body and hair with a blend of floral, spicy and woody notes.

The floral and woody signature of PARIS – PARIS in a shower gel for the hair and body. The rounded form of the bottle fits in the palm of the hand, while its sleek sleeve made with natural materials evokes rippling water. To open the bottle, gently turn the lid anti-clockwise.

None

name: CHANEL Pinceau Duo Paupières Rétractable N°200 Retractable Dual-Ended Eyeshadow Brush
description:
LES PINCEAUX DE CHANEL brushes give everyone access to makeup artist techniques. Their simple yet functional design makes this a collection of desirable on-the-go accessories. Featuring a selection of synthetic bristles as soft as they are resilient, protected by a black lacquered case, they elegantly stand the test of time.

The RETRACTABLE DUAL-ENDED EYESHADOW BRUSH has two tips, designed to precisely apply cream and powder eyeshadow. It offers confident application and a foolproof professional result.

>A selection of soft and silky bristles that easily pick up eyeshadows and offer a sensorial application and perfect blending.

With its long shape, the shader tip picks up and applies cream and powder eyeshadows, simply and precisely.

With its full shape and flexible bristles, the blender tip blends and mixes different eyeshadow shades together and softens contours to perfect the makeup result.

On-the-go use: the lids protect the two retractable tips, making it easy to slip the brush into a handbag.

CARE INSTRUCTIONS:/p>

Designed to stand the test of time, LES PINCEAUX DE CHANEL brushes with synthetic bristles should be washed regularly with warm water and shampoo or mild soap. Leave flat to air dry away from sources of heat.

None

name: CHANEL Sublimage L'huile-en-gel De Démaquillage Ultimate Comfort And Radiance-Revealing Gel-To-Oil Cleanser
description:
With the SUBLIMAGE Cleansing Collection, CHANEL transforms a fundamental step of your beauty ritual into a series of sensorial discoveries. A collection of unique and complementary cleansing skincare with surprising textures. Thoroughly cleansed, purified and luminous, your complexion glows.

L’Huile-en-Gel de Démaquillage provides your skin with a moment of relaxation in a smooth and surprising texture that transforms when massaged. In contact with the skin’s warmth, the gel becomes a luxurious oil. Then, in contact with water, the oil turns into an incredibly delicate milk.

A light silky veil leaves the skin perfectly cleansed, soft, soothed and incredibly luminous. Emanating a sensation of comfort and well-being.

None

name: CHANEL Ombre Essentielle Top Coat Multi-Use Eye Top Coat, 220 Blanc Perle
description:
Illuminate an eyeshadow with a sheer wash of pearlescence, or make the eyes pop with a pearly white: the OMBRE ESSENTIELLE top coat can be layered over another shade or used by itself, for a natural-looking satin sheen.

The top coat glides onto the desired area of the eyes in a single swipe. The eyeshadow blends seamlessly onto the lids and wears like a second skin. Its formula, enriched with sage oil, offers the sensory appeal of a new, ultra-soft and creamy powder texture.

The iconic case, inimitably elegant and adorned with a double-C engraving, opens to reveal a wide mirror and three versatile applicators: a white foam applicator for sweeping on eyeshadow, a synthetic-bristle brush for blending and a tapered eyeliner brush for adding structure and definition.

None

name: CHANEL Rouge Allure Luminous Intense Lip Colour
description:
A vibrant and luminous lipstick. An ultra-fine, melt-away and second-skin texture, a palette of intense shades. A bold and daring style.

Result: deep, radiant and satiny makeup. Perfect wear from the very first stroke.

A colour-enhancing formula:

  • A high concentration of ultra-thin pigments for intense shades from the very first stroke.
  • A blend of green tea, sweet almond oil and an adherent ester for long wear and optimal protection of colours.
  • Sweet almond oil, sappan wood and green tea for smoothed, moisturised and protected lips.
None

name: CHANEL Platinum Égoïste Eau de Toilette Spray
description:
The olfactory portrait of a man with an extraverted, almost provocative, personality. An eau de toilette with a fougère-vert accord. An energetic accord with fresh and aromatic notes.

The alliance of balance and power.

This fougère-green accord has all the aromatic freshness of Lavender and Rosemary, heightened by a touch of Petitgrain from Paraguay. Its full heart blossoms over a virile accord of Clary Sage and Geranium, leading to a very pure base in which the amber warmth of exotic wood lingers on.

None

name: CHANEL Sublimage Le Baume The Revitalising, Protecting And Soothing Balm Jar, 50g
description:
Enriched with polyfractioned Vanilla Planifolia and vanilla enfleurage oil, SUBLIMAGE Le Baume concentrates all the revitalising power of SUBLIMAGE skincare in a soothing, comforting formula. Denser and silkier than a cream, yet more sensuous than a classic body balm, SUBLIMAGE Le Baume calms and revives skin that is in need of gentle comfort. Nourished, soothed and smooth, even the driest skin looks and feels transformed, its softness and radiance restored.

None

name: CHANEL Allure Homme Sport Spray Deodorant
description:
The fresh and enveloping notes of the ALLURE HOMME SPORT fragrance in a deodorant spray. An instant fresh feeling. A moment of well-being that prolongs the lingering scent of the fragrance.

The sparkling freshness of Italian Mandarin blends into the clean, intense notes of Cedar. The enveloping notes of White Musks produce a deep and intense trail.

The fresh and enveloping notes of the ALLURE HOMME SPORT fragrance are expressed in a full range of shaving and body products. The deodorant spray procures a feeling of freshness and lasting well-being. Ideal for everyday use, it prolongs the trail of the fragrance.

Alcohol-based formula

None

name: CHANEL Les Beiges Water-Fresh Blush
description:
CHANEL has created the first WATER-FRESH BLUSH based on patented microfluidic technology.

Its ultra-lightweight moisturising formula, composed of 75% water and infused with micro-droplets of pigment, provides an instant fresh feeling and non-stop comfort. It blends seamlessly with the skin for a sheer, weightless finish and delivers a flushed cheek look, as if you had spent a day in the great outdoors. A long-lasting natural healthy glow. A subtly flushed complexion, all day long. Four luminous shades, ranging from the lightest to the most intense, for a custom finish: light peach, light pink, warm pink, intense coral.

None

name: CHANEL Démaquillant Yeux Intense Gentle Biphase Eye Makeup Remover, 100ml
description:
Composed of 92% naturally derived ingredients*, the new DÉMAQUILLANT YEUX INTENSE is both gentle and effective, for a perfectly cleansed eye area and protected lashes. DÉMAQUILLANT YEUX INTENSE features a two-phase formula: a water phase enriched with rosewater and cornflower water, which are known for their soothing properties, and a highly purified oil phase that removes makeup without leaving behind a greasy residue.

*Proportion of natural ingredients and derivatives calculated according to ISO 16128.

None

name: CHANEL Bleu De CHANEL Deodorant Stick
description:
The aromatic-woody notes of BLEU DE CHANEL in a deodorant stick. An instant fresh feeling. A lasting sensation of well-being.

BLEU DE CHANEL, the combination of strength and elegance.

This aromatic-woody fragrance unites the invigorating freshness of citrus and the strength of an aromatic accord with the woody whisper of Dry Cedar notes. New Caledonian Sandalwood lends it a warm and sensual trail.

The aromatic-woody notes of BLEU DE CHANEL find expression in a full range of shaving and body products. The deodorant stick procures an instant fresh feeling and a lasting sensation of well-being. Ideal for everyday use, it prolongs the lingering notes of the fragrance.

Alcohol-based formula.

None

name: CHANEL Le Lift Oil-In-Cream Smooths – Firms, 50ml
description:
LE LIFT Oil-in-Cream, formulated with 93% naturally derived ingredients, corrects the appearance of wrinkles and firms and nourishes skin.

Botanical alfalfa concentrate and the 'Nourishing Glow' complex, which is rich in lipid-replenishing oils, come together in a nourishing, satiny, ultra-sensorial formula, for unparalleled comfort. Light-perfecting pearlescent particles provide an instant healthy glow effect.

Combining botanical alfalfa concentrate and the "Nourishing Glow" complex, LE LIFT Oil-in-Cream is a firming and nourishing anti-ageing skincare product that meets the needs of mature skin.

How to use:

Two different uses that are suited to your skin's needs:

  • For nourished, glowing skin each and every day, apply LE LIFT Oil-in-Cream to the face and neck after your serum every morning and/or evening
  • For a moment of comfort and as an alternative to using the product as a cream, apply LE LIFT Oil-in-Cream as a mask two times a week, avoiding the eye area. Leave a thin layer on for 10 minutes, then use a cotton round to remove any excess product

CHANEL experts developed LE GESTE LIFT to optimise the benefits of the LE LIFT skincare line: movements that are easy to perform during daily application and that are inspired by Kobido, a traditional Japanese massage technique. Implement this technique either before or after applying your skincare product.

Before application:

  • 1. Smooth, to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and plump the skin. Using your thumb and index finger, perform small pinching movements along the smile lines and forehead line, then smooth. Repeat three times
  • 2. Firm, to stimulate collagen and elastin production. Use the thumb and four other fingers to perform deep pinching movements along the jawline and on the cheeks. Repeat three times

After application:

  • Inspired by Kobido, an ancestral Japanese massage technique, this smoothing technique was designed for the products in the LE LIFT skincare line. It involves performing deep smoothing movements, in sets of three, on one half of the face using the palm of the hand, from the base of the neck to the forehead.

    These movements are then repeated on the other half of the face.

    None

name: CHANEL Inimitable Intense Volume - Length - Curl - Separation
description:
A mascara that offers an intense 3D makeup result. Application that ensures extreme volume, length and curl, while separating lashes.

The perfect union of brush and formula provides a multi-dimensional effect:

  • The soft and flexible elastomer brush lines up ultra-thin bristles precisely adjusted for optimal cling and application.
  • The formula, composed of a patented Vinyl Copolymer Complex, coats lashes for an intense 3D makeup result with no clumps in sight.
  • A Vinyl Copolymer Complex for a fluid texture, separated lashes and customised makeup with no clumps in sight.
  • Paraffin wax and wax microbeads to offer intense volume and length to lashes.
  • Carnauba wax and beeswax for a shiny makeup result and a volumising effect.

Provitamin B5 for a nourishing effect.

Ophthalmologist tested. Suitable for contact lens wearers.

None

name: CHANEL Les Beiges Blush Stick Sheer Blush in a Stick for a Healthy Glow
description:
With its luminous velvet finish, it sculpts and enhances a natural healthy glow by adding a touch of colour to the cheekbones. A silky second-skin texture for a light, powdery sensation under your fingers.

  • Enriched with cotton and rose extracts, as well as beeswax for melt-away comfort.
    • None

name: CHANEL Bleu De CHANEL Spray Deodorant
description:
The aromatic-woody notes of BLEU DE CHANEL in a deodorant spray. An instant fresh feeling. A moment of well-being that prolongs the lingering scent of the fragrance.

BLEU DE CHANEL, the meeting of strength and elegance.

This aromatic-woody fragrance teams the invigorating freshness of citrus and the strength of an aromatic accord with the woody whisper of dry, amber cedar notes. New Caledonian Sandalwood lends it a warm and sensual trail.

The aromatic-woody notes of BLEU DE CHANEL find expression in a full range of shaving and body products. The deodorant spray procures a feeling of freshness and well-being. Ideal for everyday use, it prolongs the trail of the fragrance.

Alcohol-based formula.

None

name: Susan Caplan Pre-Loved Chanel Heart Drop Clip-On Earrings, Dated 1995
description:
Full of love, these clip-on earrings feature a heart-shaped drop with the iconic CC logo to the middle. Stamped with Chanel authenticity mark and dated 95.

According to the fashion house, Coco Chanel designed the famous logo herself in 1925, finding inspiration from the geometric patterns of stained-glass windows of a chapel in Aubazine, a monastery where Chanel grew up and spent most of her childhood.

This Chanel item was authenticated and supplied by Susan Caplan who are sourcing experts and are not affiliated with or endorsed by Chanel.

We work closely with a selection of suppliers who source and authenticate our pre-loved jewellery. Our pre-loved jewellery assortment consists of pieces which could be: pre-loved, repurposed from pre-loved jewellery, vintage or retro pieces which have limited availability.

Please note that pre-loved jewellery may include gentle wear but which does not detract from the look. Some of these items were produced prior to the introduction of the 2002 law prohibiting the use of nickel or nickel compounds.

Should you wish to make a return, items over £500 must be taken to a branch to be sent to one of our suppliers for verification before we can provide a refund.

None

name: CHANEL Gabrielle CHANEL Foaming Shower Gel
description:
Perfumed with the floral notes of the GABRIELLE CHANEL fragrance, this foaming shower gel leaves the body subtly scented. A light, fluid texture that transforms into a fine lather on contact with water. A sensory indulgence, whether used alone or to prolong the trail of your GABRIELLE CHANEL fragrance.

A foaming gel with the pure, floral notes of the GABRIELLE CHANEL fragrance, housed in an identical bottle. A solar composition based on a bouquet of 4 white flowers. A creamy and enveloping heart of exotic jasmine shimmers with the fruity green notes of ylang-ylang. Fresh and sparkling orange blossom follows, revealing a glimpse of Grasse tuberose to finish.

None

name: CHANEL Coco Mademoiselle Foaming Shower Gel
description:
The foaming shower gel envelops the body with the fresh and modern notes of COCO MADEMOISELLE. The light, fluid, peach-hued texture transforms into a fine lather in contact with water.

A foaming shower gel with the fresh and modern notes of the COCO MADEMOISELLE fragrance, exuding the vibrant notes of Orange, the transparency of Rose and the elegance of Patchouli.

A complete perfuming ritual for the bath and body to enhance the oriental-fresh fragrance trail of COCO MADEMOISELLE. The foaming bath gel leaves the skin delicately scented with the notes of the fragrance.

None

name: CHANEL Pinceau Teint 2 En 1 - Fluide Et Poudre N°101 2-in-1 Foundation Brush Fluid And Powder
description:
LES PINCEAUX DE CHANEL brushes give everyone access to makeup artist techniques. Their simple yet functional design makes this a collection of desirable on-the-go accessories. Featuring a selection of synthetic bristles as soft as they are resilient, protected by a black lacquered case, they elegantly stand the test of time.

The 2-IN-1 FOUNDATION BRUSH FLUID AND POWDER is the essential tool for expert foundation application and a flawless complexion. Its hybrid shape is specially designed to adjust to fluid and compact foundations.

CARE INSTRUCTIONS:

Designed to stand the test of time, LES PINCEAUX DE CHANEL brushes with synthetic bristles should be washed regularly with warm water and shampoo or mild soap. Leave flat to air dry away from sources of heat.

None

name: CHANEL Coco Eau de Toilette Spray - 100ml
description: CHANEL Coco Eau de Toilette Spray - 100ml

name: CHANEL Coco Eau de Toilette Spray - 50ml
description: CHANEL Coco Eau de Toilette Spray - 50ml

name: CHANEL Allure Homme Eau de Toilette Spray - 100ml

name: CHANEL Allure Homme Eau de Toilette Spray - 50ml
description: CHANEL Allure Homme Eau de Toilette Spray - 50ml

name: CHANEL Bleu De CHANEL All-Over Spray, 100ml
description:
The new way to wear fragrance on the go: the fresh, woody scent of Bleu De CHANEL, in a fresh and hydrating fragrance body spray. Infused with Japanese green citrus extract, an active ingredient developed by CHANEL, the All-Over Spray helps keep skin feeling comfortable and hydrated. A light mist leaves skin subtly scented.

Designed to be taken everywhere with you, it allows you to prolong your scent trail at any time of day.

How to use:

The fresh formula of Bleu De CHANEL All-Over Spray lends itself to generous and spontaneous misting on the body. Its portable format that you can take anywhere with you allows for easy re-application anytime throughout the day.

Wear alone or layer with the Bleu De CHANEL fragrance.

None

name: CHANEL Sycomore Les Exclusifs de CHANEL Eau de Parfum 200ml Fragrance Gift Set
description:
A limited-edition set that showcases two exceptional creations: the SYCOMORE Eau de Parfum and Body Oil, for a sensual and sensorial fragrance experience.

The comforting and enveloping SYCOMORE Body Oil is a more exclusive way to wear fragrance, amplified by the SYCOMORE Eau de Parfum. When used in tandem, they reveal a voluptuous and bold signature woody trail.

How to use:

A new, sensual and sensorial way to experience fragrance.

Apply SYCOMORE Body Oil generously to leave the skin with a luminous finish. It can be applied alone or layered with the corresponding fragrance to intensify and prolong its trail.

Set contains:

  • Sycomore Les Exclusifs de CHANEL Eau de Parfum, 200ml
  • Sycomore Fragranced Body Lotion, 250ml
None

name: Hachette Book Group Workman Little Book of Chanel Book
description:
A concise and illustrated biography on one of the world's most influential couturiers and founder of a global fashion brand. Little Book of Chanel is the pocket-sized and beautifully illustrated story of the most celebrated fashion designer in history.

Chronicling the life and legacy of Coco Chanel, one of fashion's most influential couturiers, this gorgeous book offers a fascinating account of Chanel's evolution and innovation. From her early days of millinery, through her revolutionary inventions in sportswear and jersey fashions for women, to the classics that made her name, such as the Chanel cardigan jacket, little black dress and exquisite perfumes.

Detailed photographs and sketches of Chanel's designs, along with fashion photography and catwalk shots, pay tribute to one of the world's most highly regarded fashion houses and the woman behind it, making a striking gift for any lover of fashion.

None

name: CHANEL Le Volume Révolution De CHANEL Extreme Volume Mascara
description:
The first 3D-printed mascara brush, patented* by CHANEL. Innovative technology for a revolutionary brush design.

The honeycomb structure of the brush loads it with just the right amount of formula. Printed in a unique material, the brush completely releases the mascara with a first sweep of the lashes. In a single stroke, eyelashes reveal immediate, extreme volume without clumping. They reveal an arresting effect.

*A patented formula (France, the United States, Japan, Korea, China) and two French patents pending.

  • A combination of waxes (rice wax, beeswax) and a supple texture that intensely coats and thickens the row of lashes
  • A polymer film keeps the “extreme volume” result in place until makeup removal
  • A pro-vitamin strengthens lashes with each application for a nourishing effect

Ophthalmologist tested. Suitable for contact lens wearers.

None

name: CHANEL Rouge Coco Baume Hydrating Conditioning Lip Balm
description:
A moisturising balm for the lips. A soft, ultra-comfortable texture that melts away in an instant. Easy daily wear, quick to apply.

Result: sheer, shiny makeup, moisturised lips all day long.

ROUGE COCO BAUME is enriched with the "Hydratender" complex, composed of:

  • Natural esters (components of the NMF*) to immediately moisturise the lips.
  • A Meadowfoam oil derivative to protect and maintain hydration for 8 hours straight.**
  • Phyto-ceramides that protect and smooth the lips by imitating the skin's ceramides.

The combination of waxes and phytosterols of botanical origin creates a watery makeup effect with intense shine.

Amino-ceramides deliver heightened moisturisation, while repairing and protecting the lips.

*Natural Moisturising Factor

**Evaluation via the electric measurement of hydration obtained after application on the forearms (n=16)

None

name: CHANEL Le Dissolvant Douceur Gentle Nail Enamel Remover, 50ml
description:
Better than a classic nail polish remover, this nail colour remover eliminates all traces of enamel in a single step, while instantly and gently reviving the radiance of the nails. Its formula is enriched with argan oil and a Vitamin E derivative. It has a light, delicate scent.

None

name: CHANEL Allure Homme Sport Eau Extréme Spray
description:
Allure to the extreme. A powerful and dynamic fragrance. An aromatic-musky fragrance that empowers you to push your limits.

An aromatic-musky fragrance with powerful, dynamic notes.

The fresh and sparkling notes of Italian Mandarin teamed with the green, coniferous notes of Moroccan Cypress give a vibrant, aromatic impetus to the fragrance. Musky notes flourish in the warm and almondy accords of Venezuelan Tonka Bean, unfurling a sensual and enveloping trail.

An intense eau de parfum, like a rush of adrenaline.

None

name: CHANEL Coco Noir Eau De Parfum Spray - 100ml
description: CHANEL Coco Noir Eau De Parfum Spray - 100ml

name: CHANEL Coco Noir Eau De Parfum Spray - 50ml
description: CHANEL Coco Noir Eau De Parfum Spray - 50ml

name: CHANEL Le Lift Smoothing And Firming Rich Cream
description:
For the first time, CHANEL has created a new smoothing and firming cream, highly concentrated in naturally occurring ingredients. LE LIFT Crème is formulated using 94% naturally occurring ingredients, including a new star ingredient: botanical alfalfa concentrate, which has been shown to be as efficient as retinol* and gentle on the skin.

The new LE LIFT cream is available in three textures: Crème Fine, Crème and Crème Riche. Three textures in perfect affinity with the skin that deliver a truly sensory experience.

*Comparisons of the stimulation of keratinocyte differentiation and proliferation, as well as Type I collagen synthesis – In vitro tests. Comparison of the increase of epidermal thickness – Tests on reconstructed skin. Comparisons of anti-wrinkle and smoothing effects – Instrumental evaluation of 21 women.

None

name: CHANEL Hydra Beauty Camellia Water Cream Illuminating Hydrating Fluid Jar
description:
HYDRA BEAUTY Camellia Water Cream is a radiance-revealing, ultra-hydrating fluid moisturiser enriched with white camellia active ingredients.

Inspired by the way light shimmers when reflected on the water, its formula illuminates the complexion and gives skin a natural glow. White camellia floral water delivers freshness and a unique lightweight feel. Skin is replenished, unified, beautifully radiant and ready for makeup application.

HYDRA BEAUTY Camellia Water Cream envelops the skin in a veil of freshness, delivers intense comfort and immediately evens out the complexion. Skin is perfectly hydrated, protected, soft and radiant. Fine lines are smoothed, pores diminished. The complexion looks clear and luminous.

HYDRA BEAUTY Camellia Water Cream facilitates foundation application and reinforces radiance.

  • Complexion freshness: + 28%*
  • Hydration: + 52%**
  • Comfort: + 21%***
  • Luminosity: + 58%****
  • Even complexion: + 30%*****

*Clinical evaluation on 20 young Asian women immediately after application.

**Instrumental evaluation on 21 Asian women immediately after application.

***Self-assessment by 21 young Asian women immediately after application and after 8 hours.

****Clinical evaluation on 21 young Asian women immediately after application.

*****Clinical evaluation on 21 young Asian women immediately after application.

None

name: CHANEL LE GEL Cleansing Gel, 150ml
description:
Thoroughly cleansing the skin is an important daily routine governed by essential steps.

THE CLEANSING COLLECTION by CHANEL offers skincare with an unprecedented sensory effect, for removing makeup, cleansing and purifying the skin. Products are suitable for all skin types, revealing the natural beauty of your skin.

LE GEL is a foaming cleanser. On contact with water, its fresh texture transforms into an invigorating foam that thoroughly cleanses and purifies skin.

This gel formula transforms into an invigorating foam that purifies the skin, diminishes the appearance of pores, reduces shine and unveils a matte complexion and a fresh glow.

How to use:

Use daily, in the morning and at night.

  • 1. Dispense 1 to 2 pumps of LE GEL cleanser and work up a lather in the palm of your hand
  • 2. Apply to a damp face, avoiding the eye area, and massage onto skin with small circular movements
  • 3. Rinse face thoroughly with cold water until foam has completely disappeared
  • 4. Gently dry skin, patting with a clean towel to minimise sebum production
None

name: CHANEL Inimitable Volume - Length - Curl - Separation
description:
A mascara that offers an instant, natural 3D makeup result. Application that ensures volume, length, curl and separation of lashes.

The perfect union of brush and formula provides a multi-dimensional effect:

  • The soft and flexible elastomer brush lines up ultra-thin bristles precisely adjusted for optimal cling and application.
  • The formula coats lashes for a 3D makeup result with no clumps in sight.
  • Rice wax and polymers to offer volume, length and curl to lashes.
  • Carnauba wax and beeswax for a shiny makeup result and a volumising effect.
  • Provitamin B5 for a nourishing effect.

    • Ophthalmologist tested. Suitable for contact lens wearers.None

name: CHANEL Le Volume De CHANEL Waterproof Mascara - 20 Brun
description: CHANEL Le Volume De CHANEL Waterproof Mascara - 20 Brun

name: CHANEL Le Volume De CHANEL Waterproof Mascara - 10 Noir
description: CHANEL Le Volume De CHANEL Waterproof Mascara - 10 Noir

name: CHANEL Allure Homme Édition Blanche Eau de Toilette Concentrée Spray
description:
A new dimension of style, striking a perfect balance between formal elegance and confident uniqueness. An explosive alchemy of hot and cold. An Amber-fresh fragrance housed in a solar bronze bottle with the contrast of a polar white cap.

A unique and explosive alchemy of hot and cold.

This Amber-fresh fragrance combines the citrus freshness of Lemon and Italian Bergamot with an Amber breeze of New Caledonian Sandalwood, Haitian Vetiver and Vanilla from Madagascar.

The eau de parfum can be sprayed in a cloud onto clothes and skin for a more intense fragrance. It is defined by a highly fragrant composition with a greater concentration of noble raw materials for a more pronounced character. A full range of shaving and body products is also available to intensify the fragrance throughout the day.

None

name: CHANEL Coco Mademoiselle Eau de Parfum Intense Spray
description:
COCO MADEMOISELLE Eau de Parfum Intense. The essence of a free and captivating woman. An ambery woody fragrance with a full-bodied character: sensual, deep and addictive.

COCO MADEMOISELLE Eau de Parfum Intense is an Amber, woody and ambery fragrance with an extreme character. The fragrance is structured around an overdose of patchouli, warmed by an ambery accord of Vanilla absolute and Tonka Bean. A heart of rose and jasmine and the contrasting freshness of citrus add their notes to write this powerful score.

The Eau de Parfum Intense comes in a spray for easy and generous application on the skin or clothing.

None

name: Hachette Book Group Workman Absolutely Chanel Book
description:
A landmark publication detailing the story of couture's most coveted brand.

CHANEL is one of the best-known luxury brands in the world. Yet it remains the most mysterious of them all. From Paris and rue Cambon, CHANEL will forever be Gabrielle - a woman who revolutionized feminine elegance. Carefree and audacious, the designer turned simplicity into the height of luxury. Bold and unpredictable, the brand, now over 100 years old, continues to astound with its one-of-a-kind fashion shows, iconic N°5 perfume and 2.55 bag, exquisite jewellery and cutting-edge beauty products. By passing on its unparalleled expertise over time - from Gabrielle Chanel, to Karl Lagerfeld, to Virginie Viard - it has built its legend.

With a wealth of beautiful images and fascinating inserts, including previously unpublished facsimile documents, this volume is an invitation into the sublime and eternal world of the House of CHANEL.

None
